title: It’s Impossible For Ruby….
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Karin-san, do you want to wear Ruby’s scarf?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Eh? It’s not cold so it’s fine, Ruby-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Is it really not cold? Your upper chest area seems…. A bit cold….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Upper chest…. You mean, here?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Waah!? Ru-, Ruby can see it even if you don’t get that close~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>….This reaction, it’s been a while….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I’m showing my chest on purpose. These moles right here are sexy right? You can touch it, you know? We’re both girls after all<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Pigiii---!? Ru-, Ruby’s eyes are closed okay! Ruby can’t see it okay!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, are you really okay doing it with your eyes closed? We can also do other things, you know….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
